title: Riverside - Studio $720 1 Bedroom $870 - Pet Friendly
posting_body: ['The Riverside Building in the West End of Lakewood is located at 17540 Madison Avenue.', 'Close to restaurants & bars, minutes from I-90, Downtown Lakewood, and Rocky River.', '1 Bedroom Info', '<URL>', 'Rent is $870', '* Photos/videos may be of other units in the building, not the available unit.', 'Studio Info', 'Video coming soon', 'Rent is $720', '* Photos/videos may be of other units in the building, not the available unit.', 'Features', 'Tenant responsible for electric and cooking gas', 'Landlord pays for heat, water, sewer, trash', 'Laundry in building', 'Secure entry', 'Lot parking included with rent', 'Pet Policy: This location accepts cats & dogs, limit 2 pets per unit.', 'Dog weight limit 25 pounds full grown.', '$25/pet/month, no pet deposit.', 'Application Process', 'The non refundable application fee is $35 for the first application and $5 for any additional applications, anyone 18 or over who intends to reside in the apartment must submit an application.', 'We accept cash, check, money order, and debit card.', "Applications must be filled out in their entirety and submitted with photo ID and proof of income (last 4 weeks/last 2-4 pay stubs from current job, or if self employed last 3 months of bank statements showing deposits, or if receiving social security this year's letter).", 'Please call', 'show contact info', 'to schedule a tour or to apply.', 'We have several properties in the neighborhood, at AIY Properties we are confident that we have an apartment that fits your budget and preferences.', 'Please contact us at', 'show contact info', 'or <URL>.']
